metadata.title: Elga - Restoring Balance Together
metadata.description: A Balinese-owned waste management company restoring Bali's natural beauty through sustainable, end-to-end waste solutions.

hero.title: Restoring Balance Together
hero.subtitle: A Balinese-owned waste management company, strengthened by an Australian alliance, dedicated to permanently restoring Bali's environmental harmony.

vision.title: A Bali Where Balance is Restored
vision.description: We envision a Bali where waste no longer pollutes land, rivers, or oceans — where environmental balance is restored and protected for generations.

philosophy.title: Rooted in Tri Hita Karana
philosophy.description: The Balinese philosophy of harmony between humans, nature, and the spiritual realm guides everything we do.

partnership.title: Balinese Leadership, Global Standards
partnership.description: This is not a foreign solution imposed on Bali. It is a Balinese solution — strengthened by trusted Australian partners.

balinese.title: Balinese Ownership
points: Profits and impact stay on the island

cta.title: Be Part of Bali's Restoration
cta.description: Whether you're a household, village, business, or organization — there's a place for you in this movement.

hero.title: The Challenge We Face
hero.subtitle: Bali's waste crisis threatens the island's environment, culture, and future. Understanding the problem is the first step toward solving it.

crisis.title: A Growing and Complex Challenge
crisis.description: As of 2026, Bali generates an estimated 1.6–1.8 million tonnes of waste annually.

tourism.title: Record Tourism
tourism.description: Visitor numbers surpassing all previous years

consumption.title: Rising Consumption
consumption.description: Increased reliance on packaged and imported goods

responsibility.title: Limited Accountability
responsibility.description: No producer responsibility for waste materials

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Gaps
infrastructure.description: Despite policy intent and growing awareness, waste infrastructure in Bali remains fragmented.
issues: Collection coverage inconsistent across rural areas
Sorting at source uneven and poorly enforced
Recycling capacity exists but lacks coordination
Landfills like TPA Suwung over capacity

consequences.title: Environmental and Cultural Consequences
consequences.description: The impacts of inadequate waste management are visible and deeply felt.

points.title: Rivers and Oceans
points.description: Plastic flows directly into the ocean during monsoon seasons

points.title: Marine Life
points.description: Coral reefs and marine ecosystems damaged by debris

points.title: Sacred Spaces
points.description: Temple surrounds and ceremonial waterways degraded

points.title: Community Health
points.description: Open burning releases toxins into neighborhoods

cta.title: This Crisis Demands Action
cta.description: The gap between policy vision and on-the-ground execution is where transformational change is required.

hero.title: Our Approach
hero.subtitle: End-to-end accountability from household to final outcome. Nothing disappears into 'somewhere else'.

points.title: Balinese-Owned, Bali-First
points.description: Decision-making authority, community engagement, and long-term vision sit with Balinese leadership.

points.title: End-to-End Accountability
points.description: We own the entire waste journey: collection, sorting, processing, recovery, disposal, and reporting.

points.title: Restoration, Not Just Management
points.description: Our goal is environmental repair — cleaner rivers, reduced landfill dependency, permanent plastic reduction.

collection.title: Collection: Reliable, Respectful, Local
collection.description: Waste collection designed around Bali's realities.
features: Separate streams for organic, recyclable, and residual waste
Flexible routing aligned with ceremonies and festivals

processing.title: Processing: Decentralised, Resilient
processing.description: Regional processing hubs instead of a single central facility.

circular.title: Circular Economy in Practice
circular.description: Recovered materials returned to productive use.

outcomes.title: Data
outcomes.description: Shared to inform packaging reduction upstream

hero.title: Our Impact
hero.subtitle: Measured, verified, and transparently reported. Trust is earned through data and consistency.

metrics.title: Real Numbers, Real Change
metrics.description: Every tonne diverted, every plastic item recovered, every job created — we track it all.

hero.title: Community
hero.subtitle: Communities are partners, not customers. We work through Banjar and Desa structures to co-design waste systems that fit local life.

banjar.title: Working Through Banjar and Desa
banjar.description: We collaborate with Banjar leaders, village councils (desa adat), and local cooperatives to co-design waste systems that fit local life, not disrupt it.

education.title: Education as Core Infrastructure
education.description: Behaviour change is treated as essential infrastructure, not an afterthought.

jobs.title: Local Jobs, Local Pride
jobs.description: Every role in our operation — from collection to processing to management — is filled by Balinese people.

hero.title: For Business
hero.subtitle: Tourism depends on Bali's environment. We help hotels, resorts, and hospitality operators meet their sustainability goals.

items.title: Verified Waste Diversion
items.description: Detailed reporting of waste diverted from landfill

items.title: ESG-Ready Data
items.description: Reports formatted for international sustainability standards

items.title: Guest-Facing Stories
items.description: Compelling sustainability narratives for your guests

partnerships.title: Partnership, Not Just Service
partnerships.description: We work alongside your team to integrate waste management into your sustainability strategy.

hero.title: Get Involved
hero.subtitle: Bali's restoration requires all of us. Find your place in this movement.

options.title: Households
options.description: Start separating waste at home and join your Banjar's program.

options.title: Villages
options.description: Partner with us to bring comprehensive waste services to your community.

options.title: Businesses
options.description: Integrate sustainable waste management into your operations.

options.title: Supporters
options.description: Support the mission through advocacy, funding, or collaboration.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Receive updates on our progress, impact stories, and opportunities to contribute.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or want to discuss a partnership? We'd love to hear from you.
